teamMembers.name: Shambhavi Mishra
teamMembers.description: Shambhavi Mishra is a Web Development Intern at Prodigy InfoTech. She currently serves as the Treasurer of the AWS Cloud Club at MIT ADT University. Passionate about web development, cloud computing, big data, and UI/UX design, Shambhavi also has a strong command of Java and Advanced Java. She actively works on real-world tech projects and strives to combine creativity with technology to build meaningful digital experiences.
